content.raw:
There's a [cpplint error in the test](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/559/cppcheckResult/). It seems spurious to me, but I don't think we can suppress cpplint errors.

It's complaining about "Missing spaces around =" in the sdf string constant. Is there an easy way to tweak the string constant to fix this?
content.html:
There's a cpplint error in the test. It seems spurious to me, but I don't think we can suppress cpplint errors.

It's complaining about "Missing spaces around =" in the sdf string constant. Is there an easy way to tweak the string constant to fix this?
